title: Understanding Empty Property Rates in 2025: A Complete Guide
excerpt: Empty property rates can cost landlords thousands. Learn how business rates work, what relief is available, and how to legally reduce your liability.

title: What is Beneficial Occupation and How Does It Save You Money?
excerpt: Beneficial occupation is a legal way to reset empty property relief periods. Discover how this compliance-focused approach can save you up to 100% on rates.
author: VacatAd Team

title: 5 Costly Mistakes Empty Property Owners Make
excerpt: Avoid these common pitfalls that cost property owners thousands in unnecessary rates. Learn the mistakes that could be draining your profits.
